instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 shuts down after about 10 minutes of heavy video use
threads.message:
Clean board, MacBook seems like it was dropped heavy in one corner.

I already carefully inspected the board and found nothing.

Put it in UC and oven at 300c.

New good quality thermal paste was applied too.

The problem is that after about 3-10 minutes of use when using something line netflix or youtube the MacBook shoots down completly.

threads.title: 820-00165 shuts down after about 10 minutes of heavy video use
threads.message:
Try another heatsink first.
Monitor CPU temps in HWMonitor.
